page.title: 15CLUBS
page.content: There are numerous local organisations. The Maidencombe Womens Institute meet regularly, and is a very active organisation. There is a local Age Concern group; a Mothers Union; and a support group for the Rowcroft Hospice in Torquay. A mothers and toddlers playgroup meet once a week. All these and the Twinning Association hold fund raising events. The primary school has a Parent Teacher Association. Most organisations make use of the vllage hall. In Combeinteignhead there are similar groups.
